Echokeys

Echokeys

AI-Powered Piano Learning for All Levels

Our Story

Our journey began with a simple truth: many busy adults dream of rekindling their love for music or embarking on a new musical adventure. Whether it's playing a beloved song🎹🎵, serenading loved ones💕🥰, or enjoying a creative outlet😊, the dream of playing the piano lives on.

At EchoKeys, we understand the challenges of traditional piano lessons. That's why our team from Carnegie Mellon University created EchoKeys, combining a versatile hardware attachment with AI-powered software to turn any piano into an interactive learning experience.

Our mission is clear: make piano learning easy, engaging, and adaptable. EchoKeys lets you learn at your own pace, on your terms, in your home.

Bring the joy of music back into your life. Let EchoKeys unlock the musician in you.
